entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .Net Won't Run Android Emulator #26592
  • MAUI-WinUI app crashes/cannot attach debugger after updating maui workload #26590
  • Why ColortoInverseColorConverter requires [RequireService] ? #26589
  • Image shows as another asset in .Net Maui version 9.0 #26588
  • The keyboard is not opening in the Android 15 simulator #26587
  • After installing VS2022 17.12, build apparently does nothing #26585
  • Assistance Required for Clearing Application Data in MAUI App #26583
  • Can't add windows as targetframework to .net maui project #26582
  • Setting Source on a binding when x:DataType is set is not allowed #26580
  • [Binding SG] Source generator does not respect private setters #26578
  • ObservableCollection changing after page with ListView it was bound to closed with PopModalAsync #26577
  • [iOS] Slider only works once, when underneath a UIGestureRecognizer #26565
    Backlog
  • iPad - ActionSheet does not stay in the centre of the screen on orientation change #26560
    .NET 9 SR3

Closed

  • Blazor Maui touch events overload make UI unresponsive during many touch events during heavy workload. #25612
  • plugin firebase dll block ios app building #26455
    Backlog
  • New MAUI App Missing Namespaces #26581
  • Error in Microsoft.Maui.Controls version 9.0.0 or later App.xaml.cs (SC0246) #26584
  • In MAUI (.net 8) , when I update the Microsoft.MAUI.Controls and Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Compatibility to version 9.0.10 app fails builds #26586
  • [iOS] Border.Shadow hide the collectionView Header #19338
    .NET 9 SR3
  • [iOS] Fix HeaderFooterGrid to pass on CV1 and CV2 #25773
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • getting error - XamlC warning XC0022: Binding could be compiled to improve runtime performance if x:DataType is specified. #26571
  • [IOS] CollectionView with HorizontalGrid Layout did not align single item properly. #25181
    Backlog
  • Unable to load MacCatalyst Arm64 dll #26529
  • New CollectionView2 Handler does not attach Behaviors in Datatemplate #26551
    .NET 9 SR3
  • Unable to remove new secondary navigation/title bar on Android #26544
  • Running an Android app with R8 shrinking results in Java.Lang.IllegalStateException: FragmentManager has not been attached to a host. #26074
    Backlog
  • Getting 403 when trying to download MAUI nightly #25112
  • Setting MenuFlyoutSubItem IconImageSource throws a NullReferenceException #25893
    .NET 9 SR3
  • DisplayAlert action buttons are backwards on Windows #26569
  • [MAUI]Button 'Add to My Recipes' on the recipe detail page cannot be fully displayed. #26562
    .NET 9 SR3
  • Performance Degradation, ANR, and Crashes After Migrating from Xamarin.Forms to .NET MAUI (v8) #26566
  • Entry.Style is Not Nullable #25227
    .NET 9 SR3
  • System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException: ArgumentOutOfRange_IndexMustBeLess Arg_ParamName_Name, index #26419
  • [Android][CollectionView]Crash when quickly clicking to delete item #22674
    .NET 9 Servicing

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix up relevant CA1416 warnings #26593
  • Add the scenario tests for the skiasharp backend #26591
  • [iOS] Inherit UIContainerView from MauiView #26576
    community ✨
  • [iOS] CollectionView with header and "complex" item will have the wrong position after a refresh with a RefreshView #26575
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • Fix for CollectionView with RefreshView when ObservableCollection<T>.Clear() throws System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException #26573
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR3
  • [Windows] Fix for SearchHandler Fails to Display Results. #26572
    area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 46 #26570
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix for Setting Window.TitleBar to null does not remove the customization  #26568
    community ✨, area-controls-titlebar, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 45 #26564
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 44 #26563
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Invert SourceRect width/height on orientation change for ActionSheet #26561
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-dialogalert

Merged

  • Update bug-report.yml 9.0.21 SR2.1 #26594
  • Border.Shadow hide the collectionView Header/footer -UITest #25960
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, area-controls-border, .NET 9 SR3
  • [iOS] Fixed HeaderFooterGrid to pass on CV1 and CV2 #26022
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR3
  • [iOS] Fix for Single item alignment issue in CollectionView HorizontalGrid Layout #25370
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR3
  • [tests] Skip some tests that are failing #26552
    area-testing, testing-flakiness, testing-green-ci, .NET 9 SR3
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 39 #26490
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 43 #26543
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 37 #26437
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Remove CastingList from MenuFlyoutSubItem #26558
    .NET 9 SR3
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 42 #26512
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR3
  • Make Style nullable #25230
    area-xaml, community ✨, .NET 9 SR3
  • Fix BindingAdapterPosition Exception #22676
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, .NET 9 SR3
  • LEGO: Pull request from lego/hb_7241b85a-f216-4d55-a9fa-d8030c736df5_20241211200252321 to main #26553

Updated

  • Implement Mac TitleBar #25670
    platform/macOS 🍏, area-controls-window, .NET 9 SR3
  • Fix more things with fonts (embedded) and unpackaged apps #26515
    area-fonts
  • Fire Navigation Events on Root Window Page #23420
    area-navigation
  • [blazorwebview] align `SupportedOSPlatform` attribute with templates #25073
    area-blazor, .NET 10 Planning
  • [ci] Enable source index #26557
    area-infrastructure, t/docs 📝, .NET 9 SR3
  • Add properties for device tests to configure release/debug #25096
    area-infrastructure, .NET 9 SR3
  • [iOS] [Android] Fix for Shell custom FlyoutIcon display problem #26016
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed Keyboard Scrolling in editors with Center or End VerticalTextAlignment is off #25827
    community ✨, area-keyboard, area-controls-editor, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR3
  • Fixed Extra Padding on iOS buttons required when image on top or bottom #26018
    community ✨, area-controls-button, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR3
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 13330: Build ID 10696069 #26556
    area-templates
  • Update SkiaSharp #26373
    area-infrastructure
  • Fixed [Windows] MAUI Entry in Windows always shows ClearButton despite ClearButtonVisibility set to 'Never' #25567
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-entry, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed Shell Navigating event issue when switching tabs #25749
    area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Cleans up the blank starter template #26448
    area-templates, community ✨
  • [iOS] Using long-press navigation on back button with shell pages - fix #24003
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • [Android] Added a scroll bar for collection view #25471
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • [iOS] Fix Gray Line Appears on the Right Side of GraphicsView with Decimal WidthRequest #26368
    area-drawing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Fix Shell animation and button visual states on Shell nav #26521
    area-navigation
  • [iOS] Inconsistent Resize Behavior for Header/Footer - fix #26456
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, community ✨, area-controls-flyout
  • Fix for issue 23316 Android AVIF support with Glide #25376
    platform/android 🤖, area-image, do-not-merge
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 14 #25989
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS]Fix for Character Spacing Not Updating Correctly in Editor for Dynamically Added Text #25347
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-editor, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 Servicing
  • Fixed Shell Tab is still visible after set Tab.IsVisible to false #24999
    area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 Servicing
  • Fixed CheckBox enabled color is not updated properly #26399
    community ✨, area-controls-checkbox, partner/syncfusion
  • Disable `MeasureInvalidated` propagation by default / clean-up legacy layouts / fix iOS CV items resize #25664
    area-layout, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • [Android] Fix for Softkeyboard Return key of an Entry control shows Done when the property ReturnType is set to Next #26501
    community ✨, area-controls-entry, partner/syncfusion
